Definition in file N_InterPan.h.

Define Documentation

#define N_INTERPAN_DEVICE_INFO_RECORD_MAX   5u

The maximum number of device info records in a device info response.

Definition at line 49 of file N_InterPan.h.

Typedef Documentation

typedef struct N_InterPan_FrameControl_t N_InterPan_FrameControl_t

ZCL frame header - frame control field.

typedef struct N_InterPan_FrameHeader_t N_InterPan_FrameHeader_t

ZCL frame header. This field is filled in by N_InterPan before the frame is sent, so it can be left uninitialised.

typedef struct N_InterPan_FrameHeader_ManufacturerSpecific_t N_InterPan_FrameHeader_ManufacturerSpecific_t

ZCL frame header with manufacturerCode. This field is filled in by N_InterPan before the frame is sent, so it can be left uninitialised.

typedef struct N_InterPan_DeviceInfo_t N_InterPan_DeviceInfo_t

Device (endpoint) info used in ScanResponse and DeviceInfoResponse commands

typedef struct N_InterPan_ScanRequest_t N_InterPan_ScanRequest_t

ScanRequest command.

typedef struct N_InterPan_ScanResponse_t N_InterPan_ScanResponse_t

ScanResponse command.

typedef struct N_InterPan_DeviceInfoRequest_t N_InterPan_DeviceInfoRequest_t

DeviceInfoRequest command.

typedef struct N_InterPan_DeviceInfoResponse_t N_InterPan_DeviceInfoResponse_t

DeviceInfoResponse command.

typedef struct N_InterPan_IdentifyRequest_t N_InterPan_IdentifyRequest_t

IdentifyRequest command.

typedef struct N_InterPan_NetworkStartRequest_t N_InterPan_NetworkStartRequest_t

NetworkStartRequest command.

typedef struct N_InterPan_NetworkStartResponse_t N_InterPan_NetworkStartResponse_t

NetworkStartResponse command.

typedef struct N_InterPan_NetworkJoinRequest_t N_InterPan_NetworkJoinRequest_t

NetworkJoinRouterRequest and NetworkJoinEndDeviceRequest commands (same payload).

typedef struct N_InterPan_NetworkJoinResponse_t N_InterPan_NetworkJoinResponse_t

NetworkJoinRouterResponse and NetworkJoinEndDeviceResponse commands (same payload).

typedef struct N_InterPan_NetworkUpdateRequest_t N_InterPan_NetworkUpdateRequest_t

NetworkUpdateRequest command.

typedef struct N_InterPan_ResetToFactoryNewRequest_t N_InterPan_ResetToFactoryNewRequest_t

ResetToFactoryDefaultsRequest command.

typedef struct N_InterPan_Callback_t N_InterPan_Callback_t

Callback structure.

Parameters:

pDestinationAddressDestination IEEE address
void N_InterPan_SendInterPanCommand ( uint16_t  clusterId,
uint8_t  payloadLength,
uint8_t *  pPayload,
uint16_t  destinationPanId,
N_Address_Extended_t *  pDestinationAddress 
)

Send an Inter-PAN command.

Parameters:
clusterIdThe cluster ID to use (e.g. 0x1000)
payloadLengthLength of the payload data (in bytes)
pPayloadPointer to payload data
destinationPanIdThe destination PAN ID (typically 0xFFFF)
pDestinationAddressDestination IEEE address, or NULL to broadcast the command.
Note:
The payload should include a proper ZCL header.
